title: Installation issue: cp2k cxxflags JSONDecodeError
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
==> [2021-05-11-18:29:56.240127] No patches needed for cp2k
==> [2021-05-11-18:29:56.240313] cp2k: Building cp2k-8.1-youn4j57zf4fp67traiy57umgyz6t2e2 [MakefilePackage]
==> [2021-05-11-18:29:56.264231] cp2k: Executing phase: 'edit'
==> [2021-05-11-18:29:56.533192] Error: JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cp2k/package.py:300, in edit:
        297            ldflags  += ['-hnoomp']
        298
        299        if '@7:' in spec:  # recent versions of CP2K use C++14 CUDA code
  >>    300            cxxflags.append(self.compiler.cxx14_flag)
        301            nvflags.append(self.compiler.cxx14_flag)
        302
        303        ldflags.append(fftw.libs.search_flags)

See build log for details:
  /var/tmp/415400605.28jzaVCdwZ/br-jheaton/spack-stage/spack-stage-cp2k-8.1-youn4j57zf4fp67traiy57umgyz6t2e2/spack-build-out.txt

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 914, in _setup_pkg_and_run
    return_value = function(pkg, kwargs)
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/installer.py", line 1776, in build_process
    phase(pkg.spec, pkg.prefix)
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 111, in phase_wrapper
    phase(spec, prefix)
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cp2k/package.py", line 301, in edit
    nvflags.append(self.compiler.cxx14_flag)
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/compilers/gcc.py", line 76, in cxx14_flag
    if self.real_version < ver('4.8'):
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/compiler.py", line 349, in real_version
    self.get_real_version())
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/compiler.py", line 525, in get_real_version
    with self._compiler_environment():
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.6/contextlib.py", line 81, in __enter__
    return next(self.gen)
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/compiler.py", line 610, in _compiler_environment
    spack.util.module_cmd.load_module(module)
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/util/module_cmd.py", line 105, in load_module
    module('unload', text[i + 1])
  File "/lustre/software/aarch64/spack/lib/spack/spack/util/module_cmd.py", line 72, in module
    env_dict = json.loads(env_json)
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.6/json/__init__.py", line 354, in loads
    return _default_decoder.decode(s)
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.6/json/decoder.py", line 339, in decode
    obj, end = self.raw_decode(s, idx=_w(s, 0).end())
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.6/json/decoder.py", line 357, in raw_decode
    raise JSONDecodeError("Expecting value", s, err.value) from None
json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)
==> [2021-05-11-18:29:56.533690] Flagging cp2k-8.1-youn4j57zf4fp67traiy57umgyz6t2e2 as failed: JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)
==> [2021-05-11-18:29:56.569692] ChildError: JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)
...
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2582-fee5cf4e49
* **Python:** 3.6.10
* **Platform:** cray-sles15-thunderx2
* **Concretizer:** original

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6461328/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6461329/spack-build-out.txt)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

Installed with following command:

```
spack install cp2k@8.1 +openmp +mpi +plumed %gcc@9.3.0 smm=blas ^fftw +openmp ^openblas threads=openmp
```

Not sure why the error is being encountered since I've requested version 8.1 and the errant code seems to be for version 7?

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers @dev-zero 
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
